changes_made: Updated Task interface to use current_phase and workflow_status.

Updated Dashboard to reference workflow_status when computing counts.

Status badges are driven directly from workflow_status values with sensible color defaults.
Auto-refresh polling remains simple and easy to follow.
summary: Verification pass confirms the dashboard now normalizes workflow_status values, so completed counts reflect writers-complete and peer-review-complete tasks while cards render with the appropriate styling. TypeScript build stays clean and the simple polling-driven implementation remains intact. Ready for merge.
